main event: A UFO sighting involving various objects observed by pilots over Santa Ana, California on 9 January 1953.
interesting points: The observed objects were described as blue lights in a V formation., The lights were reported to have a rapid rate of closure and performed maneuvers that conventional aircraft could not achieve., The sighting lasted for approximately 5 seconds., Two pilots confirmed the observation in separate reports., The weather conditions at the time were clear with good visibility.
witness description: pilots of military aircraft and other USAF personnel
